mapper.insert: insert into tbl_shymember(idx, name, email, pwd, registerdate, status) values(seq_tbl_shymember.nextval, #{name}, #{email}, #{pwd}, default, default)
mapper.select: select case( select count(*) from tbl_shymember where email = #{email} and pwd = #{pwd} ) when 1 then 1 else( case(select count(*) from tbl_shymember where email = #{email}) when 1 then 0 else -1 end ) end as LOGINCHECK from dual
select idx, name, email, pwd , to_char(registerdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as registerdate , myimg, myintro, birthday, gender, phone from tbl_shymember where status = 1 and email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_log(logno, fk_idx, status, logtime, logip) values(seq_tbl_log.nextval, #{user_seq}, 1, to_date(#{today}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{user_ip})
insert into tbl_log(logno, fk_idx, status, logtime, logip) values(seq_tbl_log.nextval, #{user_seq}, 0, to_date(#{today}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{user_ip})
